author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GILMA STILL A FORMIDABLE HURRICANE AS IT NEARS THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN...
summary:
...GILMA STILL A FORMIDABLE HURRICANE AS IT NEARS THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN...
 As of 5:00 PM HST Mon Aug 26
 the center of Gilma was located near 18.5, -138.3
 with movement W at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 968 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.
